question:
Which of the following are under the purview of Industrial Development Bank of India?
(1) Unit Trust of India
(2) Life Insurance Corporation of India
(3) Export-Import Bank
(4) State Finance Corporation of India
Choose the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: Unit Trust of India (UTI) was established in 1963 by an Act of Parliament. It was set up by the Reserve Bank of India and functioned under the Regulatory and administrative control of the Reserve Bank of India.
